item.description:
@zzjimmy wrote:

I don’t have skype, i have msn. Here is the last method I could think of. If this doesn’t work then I don’t know what else to do.

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pax")) { titles = "[@red@Owner@bla@]-"; }

Read full topic

item.title: NukeRune [317 Delta] Yell Colour REP+++
item.dc:creator: @zzjimmy zzjimmy
item.description:
@zzjimmy wrote:

Here are my yell commands for delta:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 & playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("#####")) {
String text = command.substring(5);

			yell("[@red@Owner@bla@]"+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

} else { if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && !muted && playerRights == 1) {
String text = command.substring(5);

			yell("[@blu@Mod@bla@]"+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

} else { if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && !muted && playerRights == 2) {
String text = command.substring(5);

			yell("[@red@Admin@bla@]"+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

} else { if (command.startsWith(“message”) && command.length() > 8 && !muted && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“zzjimmy”)) {
String text = command.substring(8);

			yell("" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

}
}
}
}[/code]

This means that whenever an owner yells, it will show the “owner” part in red. whenever an admin yells, it will show the “admin” part in red. Whenever a mod yells, iy shows the “mod” part in blue. If you’re planning on using this command, change the ##### in the first method to the owner’s in game name.

Read full topic

@zzjimmy wrote:

The @red@ should be in the brackets so it would look like this:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pax")) { titles = "[@red@Owner]-"; }

item.title: NukeRune [317 Delta] Yell Colour REP+++
item.dc:creator: @pax_magenz pax magenz
item.description:
@pax_magenz wrote:

Hello Moparscape!
How do i get the title “Owner” red i did this:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pax")) { titles = "@red@[Owner]-"; }
But it didnt work, it says in yell “@red@[Owner]-Pax” then. i tryed that <code=800000> or what ever its called thing to but didnt work, if i put in wrong section please REPLY!
and if this is wrong please REPLY!

[code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;
if (playerRights == 0) {
titles = “[Player]-”;
}
if (donator == 1) {
titles = “[Donator]-”;
}
if (playerRights == 1) {
titles = “[Moderator]-”;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Real”)) {
titles = “[Head Mod]-”;
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles = “[Administrator]-”;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Master IQ”)) {
titles = “[Head Admin]-”;
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = “[Co-Owner]-”;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“pax”)) {
titles = “[Owner]-”;
}
yell(titles + “” + playerName + ": "

  • command.substring(5));
    }[/code]

-Pax
